body_html: The script has measured the total time and the time per step, see time measure code. I think it will have a significance performance improvement if the problem of the GPU idle time is solved. Can you help to analysis the result of the script ?
body_text: The script has measured the total time and the time per step, see time measure code. I think it will have a significance performance improvement if the problem of the GPU idle time is solved.  Can you help to analysis the result of the script ?
body: The script has measured the total time and the time per step, see [time measure code](https://github.com/tensorflow/benchmarks/blob/master/scripts/tf_cnn_benchmarks/tf_cnn_benchmarks.py#L670). I think it will have a significance performance improvement if the problem of the GPU idle time is solved.  Can you help to analysis the result of the script ?
